import React from"react";// State
import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectMode}from"../app/appSlice";import{selectProjects,selectMainProjects}from"../app/projectsSlice";import{useGetProjectsQuery}from"../app/apiSlice";// Router
import{Link}from"react-router-dom";// Icons
import{Icon}from"@iconify/react";// Components
import{Element}from"react-scroll";import{Button,Col,Container,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import Loading from"./Loading";import Title from"./Title";import ProjectCard from"./ProjectCard";// #region component
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const theme=useSelector(selectMode);const projects=useSelector(selectProjects);const mainProjects=useSelector(selectMainProjects);const{isLoading,isSuccess,isError,error}=useGetProjectsQuery();let content;if(isLoading){content=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"d-flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{})});}else if(isSuccess){content=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[!error&&projects.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center",children:"Oops, you do not have any GitHub projects yet..."}),mainProjects.length!==0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{xs:1,md:2,lg:3,className:"g-4 justify-content-center",children:mainProjects.map(element=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectCard,{image:element.image,name:element.name,description:element.description,url:element.html_url,demo:element.homepage})},element.id);})}),projects.length>3&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"text-center mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/All-Projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{size:"lg",variant:theme==="light"?"outline-dark":"outline-light",children:["All ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{icon:"icomoon-free:github"})," Projects"]})})})]})]});}else if(isError){content=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:`${error.status} - check getProjects query in src/app/apiSlice.js`})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Element,{name:"Projects",id:"projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{size:"h2",text:"Projects"})}),content]})})});};// #endregion
export default Projects;
